data_table.description: Bone Densitometry (BMD) Whole Body Scan data file. The BMD data files include results from the DXA scans performed at the Clinical Centers participating in the WHI Osteoporosis substudy. Participants with valid results from a whole body scan are included in the data files. These data have been analyzed and monitored by the UCSF DXA Quality Assurance Center before being transferred to the CCC.

variable.name: WBVY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this BMD scan was collected.

variable.name: WBDAYS
variable.description: Whole body scan days from randomization/enrollment

variable.name: WBLFLEGFAT
variable.description: Fat mass of the left leg (grams)

variable.name: WBLFLEGFFM
variable.description: Fat free mass of the left leg (grams)

variable.name: WBLFLEGLEN
variable.description: Lean mass of the left leg (grams)

variable.name: WBRTLEGFAT
variable.description: Fat mass of the right leg (grams)

variable.name: WBRTLEGFFM
variable.description: Fat free mass of the right leg (grams)

variable.name: WBRTLEGLEN
variable.description: Lean mass of the right leg (grams)

variable.name: WBTRUNKFFM
variable.description: Fat free mass of the trunk (grams)

variable.name: WBFATCOR
variable.comment: Corrected fat mass value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: WBFFMCOR
variable.comment: Corrected fat free mass value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: WBLEANCOR
variable.comment: Corrected lean mass value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: WBMASSCOR
variable.comment: Corrected mass value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: WBPCTCOR
variable.comment: Corrected pct fat value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: WBAREACOR
variable.comment: Corrected area value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: WBMCCOR
variable.comment: Corrected BMC value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: WBBMDCOR
variable.comment: Corrected BMD value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.
